articles.title: Woman who posed as student at Boston high schools accepts plea deal, sentenced to probation
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> The Canton woman enrolled as a teen at three high schools in the Boston Public Schools district during the 2022 to 2023 academic year.

is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> The partial hiring freeze comes as the School Committee voted to close three schools by 2027, affecting hundreds of teacher and paraprofessional roles.
